note: Plush Clydesdale horsey, retired librarian, musician, author, ~artist, furry. Doesn't bite or kick, craves hugs. Gay, mated, mostly ace. Fursuits as bay horse, white wolf. IL USA. Pronouns: he/him/that_one

name: Colors:
value: eyes green & brown, fur auburn & gray

name: Home:
value: tiny farmhouse full of books, yarn & pet fur, sheet music & instruments, not to mention spinning wheels and looms...

name: Loves:
value: husband/partner of 40+ years, Pyrenees/Shepherd mix dog, one old horse, friends
